```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)
library(jsonlite)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(DT)
library(htmltools)
library(markdown)
library(scales)
theme_set(theme_minimal(base_family = "Inter"))

fmt_pct <- function(x, digits = 1) {
  ifelse(is.na(x), "\u2014", sprintf(paste0("%.", digits, "f%%"), x * 100))
}
fmt_num <- function(x, digits = 2) {
  ifelse(is.na(x), "\u2014", sprintf(paste0("%.", digits, "f"), x))
}
`%||%` <- function(x, y) {
  if (is.null(x) || length(x) == 0 || (length(x) == 1 && (is.na(x) || x == ""))) y else x
}

safe_json <- function(path) {
  if (!file.exists(path)) return(tibble())
  tryCatch(as_tibble(fromJSON(path, simplifyDataFrame = TRUE)), error = function(e) tibble())
}

data_dir <- "data"
portfolio <- safe_json(file.path(data_dir, "portfolio.json")) %>% mutate(date = as.Date(date))
metrics <- safe_json(file.path(data_dir, "metrics.json"))
drawdowns <- safe_json(file.path(data_dir, "drawdowns.json")) %>% mutate(date = as.Date(date))
rolling <- safe_json(file.path(data_dir, "rolling.json")) %>% mutate(date = as.Date(date))
attrib <- safe_json(file.path(data_dir, "attribution.json")) %>% mutate(date = as.Date(date))
trades_summary <- safe_json(file.path(data_dir, "trades_summary.json")) %>% mutate(entry_date = as.Date(entry_date), exit_date = as.Date(exit_date))
trades_equity <- safe_json(file.path(data_dir, "trades_equity.json")) %>% mutate(date = as.Date(date))
trades_narratives <- safe_json(file.path(data_dir, "trades_narratives.json")) %>%
  mutate(entry_date = as.character(entry_date), exit_date = as.character(exit_date))

about_md <- if (file.exists("about.md")) paste(readLines("about.md"), collapse = "\n") else NULL
contact_md <- if (file.exists("contact.md")) paste(readLines("contact.md"), collapse = "\n") else NULL
```

```{r metrics-cards, results='asis'}
if (!nrow(metrics)) {
  div(class = "empty", "No metrics found. Run the R exporters.") |> browsable()
} else {
  periods <- c("since_inception", paste0(format(Sys.Date(), "%Y"), "_ytd"))
  strategies <- unique(metrics$strategy)
  rows <- metrics %>% filter(strategy %in% strategies, period %in% periods)
  card <- function(r) {
    div(class = "card stat",
        div(class = "label", sprintf("%s · %s", r$strategy, toupper(gsub("_", " ", r$period)))),
        div(class = "value", fmt_pct(r$total_return, 2)),
        div(class = "muted", sprintf("CAGR %s · Vol %s · Sharpe %s · MaxDD %s",
                                     fmt_pct(r$cagr, 2), fmt_pct(r$vol, 2), fmt_num(r$sharpe, 2), fmt_pct(r$max_drawdown, 1)))
    )
  }
  div(class = "grid", lapply(seq_len(nrow(rows)), function(i) card(rows[i, ]))) |> browsable()
}
```

### Attribution (SAA vs TAA)
```{r attrib-plot}
if (!nrow(attrib)) {
  div(class = "empty", "No attribution data found.") |> browsable()
} else {
  attrib_long <- attrib %>%
    mutate(month = as.Date(paste0(substr(date, 1, 7), "-01"))) %>%
    group_by(strategy, month) %>%
    summarise(return_saa = sum(return_saa, na.rm = TRUE),
              return_taa = sum(return_taa, na.rm = TRUE),
              .groups = "drop") %>%
    pivot_longer(c(return_saa, return_taa), names_to = "bucket", values_to = "value")
  p <- ggplot(attrib_long, aes(x = month, y = value, fill = bucket)) +
    geom_col(position = "stack") +
    facet_wrap(~ strategy, scales = "free_y") +
    scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::percent_format(accuracy = 1)) +
    scale_x_date(labels = scales::date_format("%Y-%m"), date_breaks = "3 months") +
    labs(x = NULL, y = "Return contribution", fill = NULL) +
    theme(legend.position = "bottom")
  ggplotly(p, dynamicTicks = TRUE)
}
```

### Trades Table
```{r trades-table}
if (!nrow(trades_summary)) {
  div(class = "empty", "No trades found.") |> browsable()
} else {
  ret_col <- if ("spread_total_return" %in% names(trades_summary)) {
    trades_summary$spread_total_return
  } else if ("total_return" %in% names(trades_summary)) {
    trades_summary$total_return
  } else {
    rep(NA_real_, nrow(trades_summary))
  }
  dd_col <- if ("max_drawdown" %in% names(trades_summary)) trades_summary$max_drawdown else rep(NA_real_, nrow(trades_summary))
  sharpe_col <- if ("sharpe" %in% names(trades_summary)) trades_summary$sharpe else rep(NA_real_, nrow(trades_summary))
  trades_tbl <- trades_summary %>%
    arrange(desc(exit_date)) %>%
    mutate(
      entry_date = as.character(entry_date),
      exit_date = ifelse(is.na(exit_date), "Open", as.character(exit_date)),
      total_return = fmt_pct(ret_col, 2),
      max_drawdown = fmt_pct(dd_col, 1),
      sharpe = fmt_num(sharpe_col, 2)
    ) %>%
    select(Trade = trade_id, Entry = entry_date, Exit = exit_date,
           Return = total_return, DD = max_drawdown, Sharpe = sharpe)
  datatable(trades_tbl, rownames = FALSE, options = list(pageLength = 10, dom = "tip"), class = "stripe hover compact")
}
```

### Trade Rationales
```{r trade-rationales, results='asis'}
render_text <- function(x) {
  if (is.null(x) || is.na(x) || x == "") {
    span(class = "muted-small", "No rationale provided.")
  } else {
    HTML(gsub("\n", "<br/>", htmlEscape(x)))
  }
}

if (!nrow(trades_narratives)) {
  div(class = "empty", "No trade narratives found.") |> browsable()
} else {
  rows <- trades_narratives %>%
    mutate(exit_date_dt = suppressWarnings(as.Date(exit_date)),
           exit_date_sort = ifelse(is.na(exit_date_dt), as.Date("9999-12-31"), exit_date_dt)) %>%
    arrange(desc(exit_date_sort))
  cards <- lapply(seq_len(nrow(rows)), function(i) {
    r <- rows[i, ]
    tags$details(
      tags$summary(sprintf("%s · %s", r$trade_id %||% "Trade", r$title %||% "Trade rationale")),
      tags$div(class = "muted-small",
        tags$strong("Entry:"), " ", htmlEscape(r$entry_date %||% "\u2014"),
        " · ", tags$strong("Exit:"), " ", htmlEscape(ifelse(is.na(r$exit_date), "Open", r$exit_date))
      ),
      tags$div(class = "muted-small", style = "margin-top:6px;", tags$strong("Rationale:"), " ", render_text(r$rationale)),
      tags$div(class = "muted-small", style = "margin-top:6px;", tags$strong("Exit decision:"), " ", render_text(r$exit_decision))
    )
  })
  div(class = "card", tags$h3(style = "margin:0 0 8px 0;", "Trade Rationales"), tagList(cards)) |> browsable()
}
```

```{=html}
<script>
  (function() {
    const buttons = document.querySelectorAll(".tab-btn");
    const panels = document.querySelectorAll(".tab-panel");
    buttons.forEach(btn => {
      btn.addEventListener("click", () => {
        buttons.forEach(b => b.classList.remove("active"));
        panels.forEach(p => p.classList.remove("active"));
        btn.classList.add("active");
        const target = document.getElementById(`tab-${btn.dataset.tab}`);
        if (target) target.classList.add("active");
      });
    });
  })();
</script>
```
